html:
Receipt No: {{ doc.name }} Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.date_of_donation, 'dd MMMM YYYY') }}


To,

{{ doc.donor_name }}

PAN:{{ doc.pan_card }}

Address:{{ frappe.db.get_value("Donor", doc.donor_id , "address") }}


From,

Udhyam Learning Foundation

CIN NO: U80904KA2017NPL101834, PAN NO: AACCU0660K

House No 2B, 1st Floor, Municipal No.27/4

Garden Homes Apartments, Shivanchetty Gardens, Aga Abbas Ali Road, Ulsoor

Bangalore - 560042, Karnataka


Subject: Donation Receipt U/s 80G details

Dear Sir/Madam,


Thank you for your donation of ₹ {{ doc.tranche_amount }}. Your support is greatly appreciated by our team as it will help us to implement the goals of the organization. This letter provides documentation for your tax records and confirms that, as part of this donation you did not receive any goods or services in return for your donation. All donations are exempted U/s 80G of the Income Tax Act 1961 for the financial year {{ frappe.db.get_value( "Fiscal Year", {"year_start_date" : ["<=", doc.date_of_donation], "year_end_date": ['>=', doc.date_of_donation]}, "name" ) }}. Registered as a Charitable Trust with Regn No: CIT (E) BLR/12A/T-10/AACCU0660K

Received with thanks from {{ doc.donor_name }} an amount of Rupees {{ doc.tranche_amount }} vide {{ doc.mode_of_payment }} dated {{ doc.date_of_donation }} on account of Donation.


We look forward to your association with Udhyam Learning Foundation.


Thank you once again,

Warmly and with gratitude,


Director

Udhyam Learning Foundation
name: Donation Receipt
